name: Don't Let It In!
description:
DON'T LET IT IN. KEEP ALL THE WINDOWS CLOSED.

This game was made for the 2020 PSP Halloween Game Jam. It was made in 7 days (in reality, more like 10 hours), and is a simple desperate defense game. You're studying for your final exams one late night. Suddenly a burst of thunder claps and the rain pours down, and you can hear the sound of something scratching at the windows... Quickly now, you must close the windows, or else the beast will arrive. But you know that in this infinite hell, eventually you will fall.
